thread.title: Samsung Galaxy S8 UNPACKED event will be on March 29th, here is the teaser video
thread.title_full: Samsung Galaxy S8 UNPACKED event will be on March 29th, here is the teaser video

author: Victor H.
title: Samsung Galaxy S8 UNPACKED event will be on March 29th, here is the teaser video
text: Samsung Galaxy S8 UNPACKED event will be on March 29th, here is the teaser video Samsung Galaxy S8 UNPACKED event will be on March 29th, here is the teaser video Posted: â Faryaab Sheikh (@Faryaab) February 26, 2017 The Samsung Galaxy S8 will be officially announced on March 29th, 2017, and Samsung has just shown the official teaser promo video for the event. Samsung is teasing something big with the Galaxy S8: just as the LG G6, this new S8 will redefine what we think about as a smartphone, bringing a 'full-screen' design and a ton of surprises. AKG headphones in the box with the Galaxy S8 So far, we've already seen countless leaked images and expected specs: the latest and most powerful Snapdragon 835 should power the phone, two versions are coming and both with a curved, edge display, a new Samsung Bixby assistant is in the plans and a lot more. The new thing that we learn today is that the Galaxy S8 will also come with AKG headphones in the box. Nice! But let's not get ahead of ourselves, at least now we now: it's just a month until Samsung unveils its next big thing, the Galaxy S8.
